formalpara.title: Figure 2: Time lapse images of feeding motion of an L1 animal under a high power DIC compound microscope.
formalpara.para: (A) Pumping: the corpus (seen as an opening of lumen of the anterior pharynx, black arrow) and the terminal bulb (red arrow) contract and relax synchronously. (B) Isthmus peristalsis: The opening of the lumen of the posterior isthmus is marked with white arrows. During isthmus peristalsis, the posterior isthmus gradually opens and closes in an anterior to the posterior wave.
